function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Replacement of air duct types from aluminum to fabric could lead to the spread of contaminants if not managed properly.","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor contamination and transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement strict disposal or washability procedures for fabric ducts, and regular cleaning and maintenance to prevent buildup of contaminants.","Technologies":"Antibacterial sprays, UV lights for disinfection.","People":"Occupants, maintenance team, janitors.","Owner":"Facility management."},{"Description":"Lack of filters in diffusers increases the risk of spreading contaminants through the supplied air.","Impact":"Higher chances of indoor contamination and transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Install filters in diffusers and conduct regular cleaning and maintenance of the air supply system.","Technologies":"Air filters, UV lights for disinfection.","People":"Occupants, maintenance team, janitors.","Owner":"Facility management."},{"Description":"Inadequate disinfection measures can lead to the spread of contagious diseases within the facility.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among facility members.","Mitigation":"Implement UV lights, sterilizing chambers, disposable seat covers, and chlorine shoe sinks to enhance facility disinfection.","Technologies":"UV lights, sterilizing chambers, chlorine shoe sinks, disposable seat covers.","People":"Occupants, maintenance team, janitors.","Owner":"Facility management."},{"Description":"Infrequent cleaning of air diffusers and lack of complete sterilization sessions increase the risk of indoor contamination.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission within the facility.","Mitigation":"Increase frequency of air diffuser cleaning, incorporate complete sterilization sessions into preventive maintenance schedules, and use antibacterial sprays to disinfect air after use.","Technologies":"Antibacterial sprays, UV lights for disinfection, increased ventilation.","People":"Maintenance team, janitors, facility occupants.","Owner":"Facility management."},{"Description":"Inadequate spatial configuration increases the risk of disease transmission during intensive exercise sessions.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission among facility members.","Mitigation":"Install protective screens for treadmills and bikes, rearrange equipment to reduce crowding, and increase ventilation during peak training hours.","Technologies":"Protective screens, increased ventilation.","People":"Facility members, maintenance team, janitors.","Owner":"Facility management."}]}
